DIRECTV HR RECRUITER/ ADMINISTRATION

SUMMARY

My goal is to obtain a position where I can utilize and enhance my education and skills.
Highlights
Excellent communication skills
Self-directed Accurate and detailed
Certified in Basic Life Support (BLS)
Electrocardiography Certification (EKG)
Independent worker
Strong organizational skills
Energetic work attitude Courteous demeanor

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Recognized by peers and management for going above and beyond normal job functions.
Was named top leader while working at Alexander Dawson College Bound
Quality Assurance
Ensured quality of food . Quality of care for customers
Offered job promotion to management only two weeks after start date Flexibly rotated between four different jobs for Mac Shack
